description:
When person has no documented relationships, show AI-powered suggestions based on co-attendance at events, shared engagements, and organizational hierarchy. Provide bulk relationship creation with context notes.

**Rationale:** Relationship mapping is tedious manual work. AI can surface hidden connections from existing data, dramatically accelerating network documentation while ensuring important stakeholder relationships aren't overlooked.
title: Stakeholder Network Empty State with Connection Discovery
